text: Hey, I just want to know if there is any way to replicate this secret key input of Custom Code in my own application action ?

Hello,

Do you have any tricks to trigger a workflow each hours for example ?
yeah to access that variable inside of your custom code just use this code: `process.env.mysecret`

Hey Antoine, there's not really a great way to do this. Out of curiosity, what are you trying to do? Wondering if there's another way to approach this.

We do have a feature in ops hub called "scheduled triggers" which can run a workflow every day, but that's the shortest granularity we offer
I’m using Ops Hub and i would like to get informations on a custom API each hour to update contacts/companies/deals
Kinda a sync between two tools

Hi. New in HubSpot here. I'm trying to create a workflow where in when a contact fills a form (depending on the dropdown choices they select) they will be redirected to a certain page (not any external page BUT one pf our pages). I saw this <https://www.stephanieogaygarcia.com/HubSpot-website-development/redirect-a-HubSpot-form-to-a-thank-you-page-based-on-a-form-field|article> but I'm not sure how I can create this "Form Event Listener". OR maybe someone knows any tricks? :grin:
So this can't be accomplished with a workflow because the workflow will only trigger after they user finishes the form
you can do this however with the advanced form options
Just swap "favourite_fruit" with the name of your select field
and then update all the options to be your own options (Pineapple, Bananas, Grapes)
Thank you for that. But where exactly can I navigate this "advanced form options"?
If you want I can walk you through the entire setup from in 15 (1030 for me)
For future reference we solved this using the rich text module and added the form using the source code tool

Gotcha. Unfortunately once per day is the fastest that we support right now. We are investigating a feature that would allow you to trigger workflows from external webhooks, which you could potentially use here to make updates in "real time" instead of syncing every hour. No ETA on that yet but it's something we're starting to actively work
Ok it would be perfect
tagging in the author <@UBUNBSM24> as well :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks <@U2H3TT8F2>, <@UBUNBSM24> sorry for not tagging you
I’m having trouble finding error logs for our custom workflow actions when they run for an end-user — am I missing something obvious in the Developer dashboard?
We were notified that a large percentage of our custom workflow actions were returning 400/500 responses last week, but I’m not seeing anywhere that we can verify or debug those workflow runs
<@U01QVR44MEY> Any suggestions here?
I can let you know when we have something ready to try (hopefully around march of next year)
Unfortunately this information is currently only available in the workflow details, so you have to look at the workflow in the customer's portal
The response body and status code will be available in the "event details" in the workflow's action logs
